entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:16 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
